definition: to be in a sorry state/to be utterly defeated
colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
surname Hua
to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: I'm afraid our football team was really plastered  last week.
sentences.chinese: 恐怕我們的足球隊上星期真的被打得落花流水。

sentences.english: Their basketball team was rolled over by our team.
sentences.chinese: 他們的籃球隊被我們隊打得落花流水。

sentences.english: Liston would"Wipe the floor"with the young contender.
sentences.chinese: 利斯頓會把這名年輕的對手“打得落花流水”。

sentences.english: You are gonna blow them out of the water.
sentences.chinese: 你一定能把他們打得落花流水的。

sentences.english: Our team's gonna mop the floor with them tonight.
sentences.chinese: 我們隊今晚會將他們打得落花流水。

sentences.english: We really caned them in the last match.
sentences.chinese: 我們最後一場比賽可真把他們打得落花流水。

sentences.english: I played my niece at chess and she gave me a right hammering.
sentences.chinese: 我同我侄女下國際象棋時，她把我打得落花流水。

sentences.english: Although years of happy life, just like falling flowers and running water, love faded away when youth gave way to time.
sentences.chinese: 愛人纏綿幾春秋，不過落花流水，韶華一逝各自休。

sentences.english: "You put it all over him," she said tentatively, with a laugh.
sentences.chinese: “你把他打了個落花流水，”她笑了笑，試探着說。

sentences.english: The Lion beat the Unicorn all around the town.
sentences.chinese: 獅子把獨角獸打得落花流水。

sentences.english: The enemy troops were shattered to pieces by us.
sentences.chinese: 敵人的軍隊被我們打得落花流水。

definition: to be looking for one's teeth all over the floor/(fig.) to get beaten up badly/to beat the crap out of (sb)
utterly defeated
to cover one's head and sneak away like a rat (idiom); to flee ignominiously
to piss in one's pants in terror (idiom); scared witless
to run off rebuffed/to fend off/(to fight off and make sb) run off
to flee at the mere sight of (idiom)
failed and wiped over the floor (idiom); to fail utterly/a crushing defeat/beaten and in a hopeless position
to retreat again and again in defeat/to suffer defeat after defeat
to defeat/to inflict a defeat on sb
to retreat in defeat
to flee in defeat/to bolt
(idiom) everything broken and in disorder
ruined army, defeated general (idiom); scattered remnants
to kneel and beg forgiveness
battered and exhausted/stuck in a dilemma
troops in defeat like a landslide (idiom); a beaten army in total collapse
